Articles.Content: For some reason, in 0.25 when I take a Kerbal on EVA he tends to lose his grip on the ladder and drift off into space... even without my hitting Spacebar. Is this a new bug?
This happenend to me more than once too since .25 . Looks like a bug, you should report it
I just started playing .25, and it's happened to me more than once already.
You know, I think there's a song in there somewhere...

Yes, it has definitly increased for me to.

Infact, I noticed that he will simply always drift upwards/downwards along the ladder, even after I move him back to the middle

Most definitely an annoying bug especially if you are doing a suborbital flight. Even more annoying is when he gets flung away when you hit the F key to grab.

The bug has already been reported.
